title: Ticket #5360: HTCondor View: use strict
description: Enable strict mode to help catch errors. Use on a per-function level to avoid pollution if we get merged with other Javascript files.
remarks:
2015-Nov-03 11:57:47 by adesmet:
Relatively painless, and it caught a few places where I failed to declare a variable and inadvertently used a global.
check_ins: 2015-Nov-03 11:48   Check-in [47842]: "use strict" mode #5360 Caught a few cases where I used a variable without declaring it. (By Alan De Smet )
creator: adesmet
